   16: 
   17: -module(metrics_roster_SUITE).
   18: -compile(export_all).
   19: 
   20: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   21: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   22: 
   23: 
   24: -import(metrics_helper, [assert_counter/2,
   25:                       get_counter_value/1]).
   26: 
   27: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   28: %% Suite configuration
   29: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   30: 
   31: all() ->
   32:     [{group, roster},
   33:      {group, subscriptions}
   34:     ].
   35: 
   36: groups() ->
   37:     [{roster, [sequence], roster_tests()},
   38:      {subscriptions, [sequence], subscription_tests()}
   39:     ].
   40: 
   41: suite() ->
   42:     [{required, ejabberd_node} | escalus:suite()].
   43: 
   44: roster_tests() -> [get_roster,
   45:                    add_contact,
   46:                    roster_push].
   47: 
   48: %%  WARNING: Side-effects & test interference
   49: %%  subscribe affects subsequent tests
   50: %%  by sending a directed presence before the roster push
   51: %%  in add_sample_contact/2
   52: %%  TODO: investigate, fix.
   53: 
   54: subscription_tests() -> [unsubscribe,
   55:                          decline_subscription,
   56:                          subscribe].
   57: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   58: %% Init & teardown
   59: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   60: 
   61: 
   62: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   63: 
   64:     MongooseMetrics = [{[data, xmpp, received, xml_stanza_size], changed},
   65:                        {[data, xmpp, sent, xml_stanza_size], changed},
   66:                        {fun roster_odbc_precondition/0, [data, odbc, regular],
   67:                         [{recv_oct, '>'}, {send_oct, '>'}]},
   68:                        {[backends, mod_roster, get_subscription_lists], changed}
   69:                        ],
   70:     [{mongoose_metrics, MongooseMetrics} | escalus:init_per_suite(Config)].
   71: 
   72: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   73:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   74: 
   75: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   76:     escalus:create_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob])).
   77: 
   78: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   79:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob])).
   80: 
   81: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   82:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   83: 
   84: end_per_testcase(add_contact, Config) ->
   85:     [{_, UserSpec} | _] = escalus_config:get_config(escalus_users, Config),
   86:     remove_roster(Config, UserSpec),
   87:     escalus:end_per_testcase(add_contact, Config);
   88: end_per_testcase(roster_push, Config) ->
   89:     [{_, UserSpec} | _] = escalus_config:get_config(escalus_users, Config),
   90:     remove_roster(Config, UserSpec),
   91:     escalus:end_per_testcase(roster_push, Config);
   92: end_per_testcase(subscribe, Config) ->
   93:     end_rosters_remove(Config);
   94: end_per_testcase(decline_subscription, Config) ->
   95:     end_rosters_remove(Config);
   96: end_per_testcase(unsubscribe, Config) ->
   97:     end_rosters_remove(Config);
   98: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   99:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  100: 
  101: end_rosters_remove(Config) ->
  102:     [{_, UserSpec1}, {_, UserSpec2} | _] =
  103:         escalus_config:get_config(escalus_users, Config),
  104:     remove_roster(Config, UserSpec1),
  105:     remove_roster(Config, UserSpec2),
  106:     escalus:end_per_testcase(subscription, Config).
  107: 
  108: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  109: %% Tests
  110: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  111: 
  112: get_roster(ConfigIn) ->
  113:     Metrics =
  114:         [{['_', modRosterGets], 1},
  115:          {[backends, mod_roster, get_roster], changed}
  116:         ],
  117:     Config = mongoose_metrics(ConfigIn, Metrics),
  118: 
  119:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice,_Bob) ->
  120:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_get()),
  121:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice)
  122: 
  123:         end).
  124: 
  125: add_contact(ConfigIn) ->
  126:     Config = mongoose_metrics(ConfigIn, [{['_', modRosterSets], 1}]),
  127: 
  128:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  129: 
  130:         %% add contact
  131:         escalus_client:send(Alice,
  132:                             escalus_stanza:roster_add_contact(Bob,
  133:                                                               [<<"friends">>],
  134:                                                               <<"Bobby">>)),
  135:         Received = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  136:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:iq_result(Received)),
  137:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice)
  138: 
  139:         end).
  140: 
  141: roster_push(ConfigIn) ->
  142:     Config = mongoose_metrics(ConfigIn, [{['_', modRosterSets], 1},
  143:                                          {['_', modRosterPush], 2}]),
  144: 
  145:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 2}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice1, Alice2, Bob) ->
  146: 
  147:         %% add contact
  148:         escalus_client:send(Alice1,
  149:                             escalus_stanza:roster_add_contact(Bob,
  150:                                                               [<<"friends">>],
  151:                                                               <<"Bobby">>)),
  152:         Received = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice1),
  153:         escalus_client:send(Alice1, escalus_stanza:iq_result(Received)),
  154:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice1),
  155: 
  156:         Received2 = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice2),
  157:         escalus_client:send(Alice2, escalus_stanza:iq_result(Received2))
  158: 
  159:         end).
  160: 
  161: 
  162: subscribe(ConfigIn) ->
  163:     Config = mongoose_metrics(ConfigIn, [{['_', modPresenceSubscriptions], 1}]),
  164: 
  165:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice,Bob) ->
  166: 
  167:         %% add contact
  168:         add_sample_contact(Alice, Bob),
  169: 
  170:         %% subscribe
  171:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(bob, <<"subscribe">>)),
  172:         PushReq = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  173:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:iq_result(PushReq)),
  174: 
  175:         %% Bob receives subscription reqest
  176:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  177: 
  178:         %% Bob adds new contact to his roster
  179:         escalus_client:send(Bob,
  180:                             escalus_stanza:roster_add_contact(Alice,
  181:                                                               [<<"enemies">>],
  182:                                                               <<"Alice">>)),
  183:         PushReqB = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  184:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:iq_result(PushReqB)),
  185:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  186: 
  187:         %% Bob sends subscribed presence
  188:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(alice, <<"subscribed">>)),
  189: 
  190:         %% Alice receives subscribed
  191:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3),
  192: 
  193:         %% Bob receives roster push
  194:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob)
  195: 
  196: 
  197:         end).
  198: 
  199: decline_subscription(ConfigIn) ->
  200:     Config = mongoose_metrics(ConfigIn, [{['_', modPresenceUnsubscriptions], 1}]),
  201: 
  202:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice,Bob) ->
  203: 
  204:         %% add contact
  205:         add_sample_contact(Alice, Bob),
  206: 
  207:         %% subscribe
  208:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(bob, <<"subscribe">>)),
  209:         PushReq = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  210:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:iq_result(PushReq)),
  211: 
  212:         %% Bob receives subscription reqest
  213:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  214: 
  215:         %% Bob refuses subscription
  216:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(alice, <<"unsubscribed">>)),
  217: 
  218:         %% Alice receives subscribed
  219:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2)
  220: 
  221:         end).
  222: 
  223: 
  224: unsubscribe(ConfigIn) ->
  225:     Config = mongoose_metrics(ConfigIn, [{['_', modPresenceUnsubscriptions], 1}]),
  226: 
  227:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice,Bob) ->
  228:         %% add contact
  229:         add_sample_contact(Alice, Bob),
  230:         %% subscribe
  231:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(bob, <<"subscribe">>)),
  232:         PushReq = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  233: 
  234:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:iq_result(PushReq)),
  235: 
  236:         %% Bob receives subscription reqest
  237:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  238:         %% Bob adds new contact to his roster
  239:         escalus_client:send(Bob,
  240:                             escalus_stanza:roster_add_contact(Alice,
  241:                                                               [<<"enemies">>],
  242:                                                               <<"Alice">>)),
  243:         PushReqB = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  244:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:iq_result(PushReqB)),
  245:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  246: 
  247:         %% Bob sends subscribed presence
  248:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(alice, <<"subscribed">>)),
  249: 
  250:         %% Alice receives subscribed
  251:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
  252: 
  253:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  254: 
  255:         %% Bob receives roster push
  256:         PushReqB1 = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  257:         escalus_assert:is_roster_set(PushReqB1),
  258: 
  259:         %% Alice sends unsubscribe
  260:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(bob, <<"unsubscribe">>)),
  261: 
  262:         PushReqA2 = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  263:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:iq_result(PushReqA2)),
  264: 
  265:         %% Bob receives unsubscribe
  266: 
  267:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2)
  268: 
  269:     end).
  270: 
  271: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  272: %% Helpers
  273: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  274: 
  275: add_sample_contact(Alice, Bob) ->
  276:     add_sample_contact(Alice, Bob, [<<"friends">>], <<"generic :p name">>).
  277: 
  278: add_sample_contact(Alice, Bob, Groups, Name) ->
  279:     escalus_client:send(Alice,
  280:         escalus_stanza:roster_add_contact(Bob, Groups, Name)),
  281:     RosterPush = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  282:     escalus:assert(is_roster_set, RosterPush),
  283:     escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:iq_result(RosterPush)),
  284:     escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice).
  285: 
  286: 
  287: remove_roster(Config, UserSpec) ->
  288:     [Username, Server, _Pass] = escalus_users:get_usp(Config, UserSpec),
  289:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mod_roster_odbc, remove_user, [Username, Server]),
  290:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mod_roster, remove_user, [Username, Server]).
  291: 
  292: mongoose_metrics(ConfigIn, Metrics) ->
  293:     Predefined = proplists:get_value(mongoose_metrics, ConfigIn, []),
  294:     MongooseMetrics = Predefined ++ Metrics,
  295:     [{mongoose_metrics, MongooseMetrics} | ConfigIn].
  296: 
  297: roster_odbc_precondition() ->
  298:     mod_roster_odbc == escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mod_roster_backend, backend, []).
